data.name: Terenty, the Blademaster
data.notes: "Terenty, the Blademaster" can be found down the side of a building on the southern side of Mount M'gando in Cauldros. Where the southern path that leads up to Mount M'gando has a U-bend with a dormant Xe-dom is a western wall that can be climbed over to find Terenty in the ditch on the otherside.
